title: Leif Nielsen
text: Leif Bernhard Nielsen (born 28 May 1942) is a <a href="Denmark">Danish</a> former <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>, who was named the 1966 <a href="Danish%20Player%20of%20the%20Year">Danish Player of the Year</a>. He played 28 games for the <a href="Denmark%20national%20football%20team">Denmark national football team</a>, and participated in the <a href="1964%20UEFA%20European%20Football%20Championship">1964 European Championship</a>. He played for <a href="BK%20Frem">BK Frem</a> in Denmark. In 1968, he played for the <a href="Houston%20Stars">Houston Stars</a> of the <a href="North%20American%20Soccer%20League%20%281968-1984%29">North American Soccer League</a> before finishing his career with <a href="Scotland">Scottish</a> club <a href="Greenock%20Morton">Greenock Morton</a>.
